title: [Unable to connect to server] Queue Ban on my account for 20-30 mins due to server issues.
body: So following constant disconnection and being unable to connect to the game, I was placed in low priority queue or whatever the name is - My connection was fine, but still couldn't connect to the game. I haven't played the account, I don't plan on playing it until it's been lifted, if not then i'm done with League. Not going to put up with a 20-30 minute queue for 5 or so games.

replies.body:
I enjoy how people post a problem and never mention any steps they have taken to trouble shoot. or provide any information


disabled av/fw
what isp they use
repaired game
stability tested their compu
cleaned sw/virus/trojans

Its not a widespread problem, the problem is you what are you going to do?
I enjoy how people still think 1 disconnect means leaver buster.

> So, instead of trying to determine the cause of the DCs and attempting to resolve the issue you just kept playing ***knowing*** there was an issue? Seems to me like you're the idiot who put you in this situation.

Oh my bad "constant disconnection in one game"  - Sorry for not making it clear for retards like you.

And my past games have been fine , no leaves.  - Should've added that for retards like you because 'game' means my entire match history prior to the latest game where I was reported by 9 people for disconnecting.

I should also add that my ping has been fine the whole week up until promos , after killing an enemy ezreal. I was disconnected.

Thank you Heartvine for your comment.


And thanks to Neba - I already went through all those steps before posting here , but I guess we can assume that everyone who posts their problems / issues on the forum hasn't taken any necessary/required protocols to ensure they needn't it forum worthy.

There's no need to get so defensive. You were the one who failed to consider that "the game" could also refer to League of Legends as a whole.

> And my past games have been fine , no leaves.

You don't get LPQ, certainly not 20 minute LPQ, from **one** game. It ***DOESN'T*** happen. In order to get hit with LPQ in the first place you need to *consistently* leave/afk in games so maybe you should stop with that "I've never left a game" bullsh!t.

> Being reported by 9 people might've helped the situation though.

Fun Fact: reports are almost useless to the leavebuster system. In fact, even if reported by 9 people, it won't change the punishment you receive. Ultimately the reports are just a way to verify that you were AFK/DC.

> I haven't left a game in the past 3 weeks.

So, you admit to having left games before? You realise this is ***IMPORTANT*** information when talking about leavebuster, right?

> Stop being a useless prick , get a life off these forums/league in general.

I'm trying to be helpful and explain to you why you've received this punishment you're complaining about. A punishment that, based on everything you've said so far, you rightfully deserved. Instead of accepting my help and discussing how it came to the punishment you received you've been insulting and, dare I say, abusing me for offering a bit of explanation. Maybe it's time you took a good look in the mirror, because I'm sure if you have half a brain you'll be able to figure out why you've received this punishment just by doing that.
